title: Down The Ancient Stairs, Per Le Antiche Scale

sources.title: Down The Ancient Stairs Per Le Antiche Scale 1975 Marcello Mastroianni Francoise
sources.description: Macello Mastroianni plays a professor who is dedicated both to his profession and to his multiple lovers. As you might expect it does not go all that well. When a new nurse comes into the picture (Francoise Fabian) she not only thinks his ideas are bad but she refuses to sleep with him.Â
